titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C32

body.ab: <lb n="c57-0168__main__3"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0168.14" unit="tei:head"/>Walton in continuation.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0168__main__4"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0168.02" unit="tei:date"/>August 1<mdel/>3<shi rend="underline"></shi><lb n="c57-0168__main__5"/> You have read this strange & terrific story, <lb n="c57-0168__main__6"/> Marg<mdel>e</mdel>aret and <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>do not you feel your blood con<lb n="c57-0168__main__7"/>gealed with horror Mine oftendid as he <lb n="c57-0168__main__8"/> related it<lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__1"/> like that <lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__2"/> which even <lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__3"/> now curdles <lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__4"/> mine – <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0168__main__d3e33353"/>When<del eID="c57-0168__main__d3e33353"/>Sometimes seized with <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>sudden agony he <lb n="c57-0168__main__9"/> could not continue <mdel>or</mdel>his tale, at others his voice broken <lb n="c57-0168__main__10"/> yet piercing <del next="#c57-0168.08" rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0168__main__d3e33386"/>described some of the scenes<del eID="c57-0168__main__d3e33386"/>uttered the words of which it is<lb n="c57-0168__main__11"/>composed.<del next="#c57-0168.09" rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0168__main__d3e33398" xml:id="c57-0168.08"/>he had passed<del eID="c57-0168__main__d3e33398"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0168__main__d3e33401" xml:id="c57-0168.09"/>through<del eID="c57-0168__main__d3e33401"/> – His fine & lovely <lb n="c57-0168__main__12"/> eyes <metamark>^</metamark>were now lighted up <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>with indignation <mdel>or</mdel>now subdued <lb n="c57-0168__main__13"/><mdel>by</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to downcast sorrow & infinite wretchedness. Sometimes <lb n="c57-0168__main__14"/> he commanded his countenance & tones <lb n="c57-0168__main__15"/> and related the most horrible incidents <lb n="c57-0168__main__16"/> with a <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0168__main__d3e33468"/>smothered<del eID="c57-0168__main__d3e33468"/>tranquil voice suppressing every <lb n="c57-0168__main__17"/> mark of <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0168__main__d3e33477"/>indi<del eID="c57-0168__main__d3e33477"/> agitation – <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0168__main__d3e33482"/>and<del eID="c57-0168__main__d3e33482"/>then like a vol<lb n="c57-0168__main__18"/>cano bursting forth his face would sud<lb n="c57-0168__main__19"/>denly change to an expression of the <lb n="c57-0168__main__20"/> wildest rage as he shrieked <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0168__main__d3e33505"/>forth<del eID="c57-0168__main__d3e33505"/><lb n="c57-0168__main__21"/><lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__1"/>out his imprecations <mdel>of</mdel>^on hi<mdel>m</mdel>s persecutor.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0168__main__22"/> His tale is connected & told with <lb n="c57-0168__main__23"/> an appearance of the simplest truth <lb n="c57-0168__main__24"/> yet I own to you my sister that the <lb n="c57-0168__main__25"/> letters of Felix &<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0168__main__d3e33557"/>Maimouna<del eID="c57-0168__main__d3e33557"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>Safie which he <lb n="c57-0168__main__26"/> shewed me & the apparition of the <lb n="c57-0168__main__27"/> monster seen from our ship brought <lb n="c57-0168__main__28"/> to me a greater conviction of the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0168__main__d3e33578"/>fact<del eID="c57-0168__main__d3e33578"/>truth <lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__1"/>of his narrative<lb n="c57-0168__main__29"/> than his asserverations—however earnest & connected. Such a monster <lb n="c57-0168__main__30"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0168__main__d3e33605"/>did<del eID="c57-0168__main__d3e33605"/>has then real<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0168__main__d3e33612"/>ly<del eID="c57-0168__main__d3e33612"/> existence, I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0168__main__d3e33621"/>could<del eID="c57-0168__main__d3e33621"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0168__main__d3e33624"/>not<del eID="c57-0168__main__d3e33624"/>cannot doubt <lb n="c57-0168__main__31"/> it yet I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0168__main__d3e33635"/>was<del eID="c57-0168__main__d3e33635"/>am lost in surpri<mdel>z</mdel>se &admira<lb n="c57-0168__main__32"/>tion. Sometimes I endeavoured to gain from<lb n="c57-0169__main__1"/> Frankenstein the particulars of his formation <lb n="c57-0169__main__2"/> but on this point he was impenetrable. Are you <lb n="c57-0169__main__3"/> mad, my friend, said he, or whither does your <lb n="c57-0169__main__4"/> senseless curiosity lead you –Would you also <lb n="c57-0169__main__5"/> create for yourself &for the world a dæmonical<lb n="c57-0169__main__6"/> ene<mdel>n</mdel>my or to what do<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33694"/>es<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33694"/> your questions <lb n="c57-0169__main__7"/> tend. Peace, peace; learn my miseries &<lb n="c57-0169__main__8"/> do not seek to encrease your own.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0169__main__9"/> Frankenstein discovered that I detail<lb n="c57-0169__main__10"/>ed or made notes concerning his history he <lb n="c57-0169__main__11"/> asked to see them & himself corrected <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>and augmented them <lb n="c57-0169__main__12"/> in many places but principally in <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33729"/>guv<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33729"/><lb n="c57-0169__main__13"/> giving the life & spirit of the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33734"/>the<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33734"/>conver<lb n="c57-0169__main__14"/>sations he held with his enemies–Since <lb n="c57-0169__main__15"/> you have made an account <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>said he I would <lb n="c57-0169__main__16"/> not that a mutilated one should go down to <lb n="c57-0169__main__17"/> posterity. <milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0169__main__18"/> Thus have ten days passed away <lb n="c57-0169__main__19"/> while I have listened to the strangest <lb n="c57-0169__main__20"/> tale that ever imagination formed. <lb n="c57-0169__main__21"/> My thoughts & every feeling of my soul <lb n="c57-0169__main__22"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33779"/>&<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33779"/><mdel>ha</mdel>have been drunk up by the interrest <lb n="c57-0169__main__23"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33795"/>I felt in<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33795"/>for my guest <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0169.01">^</metamark><lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__1"/> which this <lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__2"/><metamark function="displacement">x</metamark> tale, & his <lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__3"/> own elevated <lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__4"/>& gentle man<lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__5"/>ners have <lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__6"/> created I wish<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33836"/>ed<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33836"/> to soothe him <lb n="c57-0169__main__24"/> yet <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33843"/>could<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33843"/>can I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33852"/>tell<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33852"/>counsel one so infinitely miserable. <lb n="c57-0169__main__25"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33862"/>Whose mind continually dwelt on horrors<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33862"/><lb n="c57-0169__main__26"/> so destitute of every hope of consolation to <lb n="c57-0169__main__27"/> live<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33869"/>?<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33869"/> Oh no – the only joy he <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33874"/>could feel<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33874"/>can now <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33879"/>feel<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33879"/> know<lb n="c57-0169__main__28"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33889"/>was<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33889"/>will be<mdel>in</mdel>when he compos<mdel>in</mdel>es<mdel>g</mdel> his shattered <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33919"/>mind<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33919"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>feelings to <lb n="c57-0169__main__29"/> peace & death — Yet <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33934"/>one<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33934"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33938"/>feeling<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33938"/> he enjoys, <lb n="c57-0169__main__30"/> one comfort, the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33945"/>sourse<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33945"/>offspring of solitude <lb n="c57-0169__main__31"/>& delirium — he <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33954"/>tho<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33954"/> believed that when <lb n="c57-0169__main__32"/> in dreams he <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33962"/>saw<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33962"/>holds converse with his friends, <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33971"/>who consoled<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33971"/><lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__1"/>& derives from <lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__2"/> that communion <lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__3"/> consolation for<lb n="c57-0169__main__33"/> his miseries or <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0169__main__d3e33994"/>instigated him<del eID="c57-0169__main__d3e33994"/>excitement to <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>his vengeance<lb n="c57-0170__main__1"/> that they <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0170__main__d3e34025"/>were<del eID="c57-0170__main__d3e34025"/>are not the creations of his <lb n="c57-0170__main__2"/> fancy but the real beings <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0170__main__d3e34034"/>that he<del eID="c57-0170__main__d3e34034"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0170__main__d3e34037"/>saw<del eID="c57-0170__main__d3e34037"/><lb n="c57-0170__main__3"/><lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__1"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0170__left_margin__d3e34049"/>beheld <del eID="c57-0170__left_margin__d3e34049"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0170__main__d3e34056"/>and conversed with<del eID="c57-0170__main__d3e34056"/><lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__1"/> who visit <lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__2"/> him from <lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__3"/> the regions <lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__4"/> of a <lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__5"/> remoter world –This faith g<mdel>a</mdel>ives a solemni<lb n="c57-0170__main__4"/>ty to his reveries that <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0170__main__d3e34106"/>made<del eID="c57-0170__main__d3e34106"/>render<mdel>ed</mdel> them <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0170__main__d3e34116"/>peculiar<del eID="c57-0170__main__d3e34116"/><del rend="unmarked" sID="c57-0170__main__d3e34119"/>ly<del eID="c57-0170__main__d3e34119"/><lb n="c57-0170__main__5"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0170__main__d3e34124"/>interresting.<del eID="c57-0170__main__d3e34124"/>to me, almost as imposing &inte<lb n="c57-0170__main__6"/>resting as truth.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0170__main__7"/> Our conversations <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0170__main__d3e34149"/>have<del eID="c57-0170__main__d3e34149"/>are not always <lb n="c57-0170__main__8"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0170__main__d3e34158"/>been<del eID="c57-0170__main__d3e34158"/> confined to his own history & misfortunes– <lb n="c57-0170__main__9"/><del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0170__main__d3e34163"/>and<del eID="c57-0170__main__d3e34163"/><mdel>o</mdel>On every point of general literature he <lb n="c57-0170__main__10"/> displays unbounded knowledge and a quick <lb n="c57-0170__main__11"/>& piercing apprehension. His eloquence is <lb n="c57-0170__main__12"/> forcible & touching nor can I hear him when <lb n="c57-0170__main__13"/> he narrates a pathetic incident or endea<lb n="c57-0170__main__14"/>vours to move the passions of pity & love without <lb n="c57-0170__main__15"/> tears. What a glorious creature must <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0170__main__d3e34196"/>this<del eID="c57-0170__main__d3e34196"/> he <lb n="c57-0170__main__16"/> have been in his days of prosperity when <lb n="c57-0170__main__17"/> he is thus noble & godlike in ruin – He seems <lb n="c57-0170__main__18"/> to feel his own worth & the greatness of <lb n="c57-0170__main__19"/> his fall. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0170__main__d3e34208"/>I have felt, said he, great &<del eID="c57-0170__main__d3e34208"/><lb n="c57-0170__main__20"/> When younger, said he, I felt as if I was destin<lb n="c57-0170__main__21"/>ed for some great enterprize. My feelings <lb n="c57-0170__main__22"/> are profound but I possessed a coolness of judge<lb n="c57-0170__main__23"/>ment that fitted me for gr<mdel>an</mdel>eat<mdel>d</mdel>enter<lb n="c57-0170__main__24"/>prises<lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__1"/> illustrious <lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__2"/> atchievements. This sentiment of the worth of my <lb n="c57-0170__main__25"/> nature supported me when others would<lb n="c57-0170__main__26"/> have sunk for I deemed it criminal <lb n="c57-0170__main__27"/> to throw away in useless grief; those ta<lb n="c57-0170__main__28"/>lents that might be useful to my <lb n="c57-0170__main__29"/> fellow creatures – When I reflected on the <lb n="c57-0170__main__30"/> work that I had compleated, no less a one <lb n="c57-0170__main__31"/> than the creation of a sensitive &<lb n="c57-0170__main__32"/> rational animal I could not rank my<lb n="c57-0170__main__33"/>self with the herd of common projectors. <lb n="c57-0170__main__34"/> But this feeling which supported me <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0170__main__d3e34304"/>only<del eID="c57-0170__main__d3e34304"/><lb n="c57-0170__main__35"/> now serves <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>only to <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0170__main__d3e34323"/>sink<del eID="c57-0170__main__d3e34323"/>plunge me lower in <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the dust— All<lb n="c57-0171__main__1"/> my speculations & hopes are as nothing and like the <lb n="c57-0171__main__2"/> Archangel who aspired to omnipotence I am <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0171__main__d3e34355"/>now<del eID="c57-0171__main__d3e34355"/><lb n="c57-0171__main__3"/> chained in an eternal hell. My imagination <lb n="c57-0171__main__4"/> was vivid yet my <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0171__main__d3e34363"/>app<del eID="c57-0171__main__d3e34363"/> powers of application were in<lb n="c57-0171__main__5"/>tense – by the union of these qualities I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0171__main__d3e34372"/>ex<del eID="c57-0171__main__d3e34372"/> conceived <lb n="c57-0171__main__6"/> the idea and executed the <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0171__main__d3e34378"/>desig<del eID="c57-0171__main__d3e34378"/> creation of a man– <lb n="c57-0171__main__7"/> Even now I cannot recollect without passion <lb n="c57-0171__main__8"/> my reveries while the work was incomplete –I <lb n="c57-0171__main__9"/> trod heaven in my thoughts – now exulting <lb n="c57-0171__main__10"/> in my powers – now <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0171__main__d3e34389"/>wi<del eID="c57-0171__main__d3e34389"/> burning with the idea <lb n="c57-0171__main__11"/> of their consequen<mdel>s</mdel>ces. From my infancy I was <lb n="c57-0171__main__12"/> imbued with high hopes and a lofty ambition <lb n="c57-0171__main__13"/> but how am I sunk – Oh my friend – if you had <lb n="c57-0171__main__14"/> know<mdel>m</mdel>n me as I once was <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0171__main__d3e34420"/>who<del eID="c57-0171__main__d3e34420"/> you would <lb n="c57-0171__main__15"/> not recognize me <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0171__main__d3e34425"/>even<del eID="c57-0171__main__d3e34425"/> in this <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0171__main__d3e34430"/>misery<del eID="c57-0171__main__d3e34430"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>state of <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0171__main__d3e34441"/>dgr<del eID="c57-0171__main__d3e34441"/> degradationDespon<lb n="c57-0171__main__16"/>dancy rarely visited my heart a high destiny <lb n="c57-0171__main__17"/> seemed to bear me on, untill I fe<mdel>e</mdel>ll oh, never <lb n="c57-0171__main__18"/> never <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>again to rise" <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0171__main__d3e34478"/>again<del eID="c57-0171__main__d3e34478"/>.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0171__main__19"/> Must I lose this <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0171__main__d3e34488"/>creature<del eID="c57-0171__main__d3e34488"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>admirable being? I have <lb n="c57-0171__main__20"/> longed for a friend, I have sought one who would sympathize <lb n="c57-0171__main__21"/> with & love me. Behold on these desart seas <lb n="c57-0171__main__22"/> I have found <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0171__main__d3e34513"/>one<del eID="c57-0171__main__d3e34513"/>such an one – but I fear I have gained him <lb n="c57-0171__main__23"/> but to know his value & lose him –I would <lb n="c57-0171__main__24"/> reconcile him with life but he repulses the <lb n="c57-0171__main__25"/> thought. "I thank you," Walton," he said, but <lb n="c57-0171__main__26"/> When for your kind intentions towards so <lb n="c57-0171__main__27"/> miserable a wretch – but when you speak <lb n="c57-0171__main__28"/> of new <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0171__main__d3e34542"/>connections<del eID="c57-0171__main__d3e34542"/>ties and<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0171__main__d3e34552"/>think<del eID="c57-0171__main__d3e34552"/>fresh affections think you that any <lb n="c57-0171__main__29"/> can replace those <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0171__main__d3e34566"/>I have lost<del eID="c57-0171__main__d3e34566"/><mdel>.</mdel>which are gone? Can any man <lb n="c57-0171__main__30"/> be to me as Clerval was or any woman ano<lb n="c57-0171__main__31"/>ther Elizabeth. Even where the affections are <lb n="c57-0171__main__32"/> not strongly moved by any superior excel<lb n="c57-0171__main__33"/>lence the companions of our childhood al<lb n="c57-0172__main__1"/>ways possess a certain power over our mind <lb n="c57-0172__main__2"/> that hardly any other later friend can <lb n="c57-0172__main__3"/> obtain. They know our infantine feelings <lb n="c57-0172__main__4"/> which however they may be afterwards <lb n="c57-0172__main__5"/> modified are never <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0172__main__d3e34619"/>entirely changed<del eID="c57-0172__main__d3e34619"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>eradicated and they <lb n="c57-0172__main__6"/> can judge of our actions with greater <lb n="c57-0172__main__7"/> certainty – A sister or brother can never, un<lb n="c57-0172__main__8"/>less indeed such symtoms have been shewn <lb n="c57-0172__main__9"/> early suspect the other of fraud or false <lb n="c57-0172__main__10"/> dealing when another friend however <lb n="c57-0172__main__11"/> strongly he may be attatched may <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0172__main__d3e34654"/>feel<del eID="c57-0172__main__d3e34654"/>be in <lb n="c57-0172__main__12"/> spite of himself invaded by suspicion. <lb n="c57-0172__main__13"/> But I enjoyed friends dear not only by <lb n="c57-0172__main__14"/> association but for their<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0172__main__d3e34668"/>e<del eID="c57-0172__main__d3e34668"/> own sake –and <lb n="c57-0172__main__15"/> wherever I am the soothing voice of my <lb n="c57-0172__main__16"/> Eliszabeth or the conversation of Cler<lb n="c57-0172__main__17"/>val will be ever whispered <mdel>to</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>in my ear. <lb n="c57-0172__main__18"/> They are dead & but one feeling <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0172__main__d3e34701"/>could<del eID="c57-0172__main__d3e34701"/>can in <lb n="c57-0172__main__19"/> such a <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0172__main__d3e34713"/>situation<del eID="c57-0172__main__d3e34713"/>solitude<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0172__main__d3e34722"/>keep me alive<del eID="c57-0172__main__d3e34722"/>persuade me to preserve my life. If I <lb n="c57-0172__main__20"/> w<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0172__main__d3e34731"/>h<del eID="c57-0172__main__d3e34731"/>ere engaged in any high undertaking <lb n="c57-0172__main__21"/> or design fraught with extensive uti<lb n="c57-0172__main__22"/>lity to my fellow creatures then could I <lb n="c57-0172__main__23"/> live to fulfil it—But such is not my <lb n="c57-0172__main__24"/> destiny –I must pursue & destroy the <lb n="c57-0172__main__25"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0172__main__d3e34752"/>creature<del eID="c57-0172__main__d3e34752"/><lb n="c57-0172__left_margin__1"/>being to whom I gave existence then <lb n="c57-0172__main__26"/> my task will be fulfilled & I may die.
